Material used.Description: The experiments were conducted using HEK293 cells transfected with PINK1 variants or patient-derived fibroblasts.

Readout description.Result Description: Mitochondrial respiration was significantly impaired in cells expressing the c.379_419del variant.
Cells expressing the c.508C>A variant showed reduced mitochondrial function compared to wild-type but less severe than the c.379_419del variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each experimental condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate for mitochondrial function assays.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 expression was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector or vehicle alone was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-way ANOVA with Tukey's test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Mitochondrial respiration rates within 80-100% of wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Mitochondrial respiration rates below 50% of wild-type controls.
